text: I second <@U04T2CUCP8T>´s message! In addition, i think it will get increasingly more important /essential in the future regarding gains in efficiency

Hello everyone, I have a question on workflows. I am on a deal and I want to assign an association label to an associated contact within a workflow. I looked it up and I didn't find a way to do, so I was wondering if you knew an application capable of doing this. Thanks a lot :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks team!! Really appreciate it. I will see what the client says about upgrading. Great <@U01QVR44MEY> will get in touch. The client is going to demo Famly and we will discuss requirements.

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

Hi everyone. I need to pass HubSpot property values to url parameters. The goals is to pass certain values to a survey platform… Is this the proper syntax to pass HubSpot data within a url…

`<https://companyurl.survey.com/jfe/form/SV_XXXXXXXXXXXXX?firstname={{personalization_token(>"contact.firstname")}}&group={{personalization_token("contact.group")}}`

Hello everyone,

I need some suggestions regarding an issue we are facing. We are running multiple Google Ads campaigns, and we've noticed that the conversions reported by Google Ads do not align with the contacts recorded in HubSpot. In many cases, HubSpot doesn't attribute the form submissions from ads to the appropriate channel and instead shows them as direct submissions.

Currently, we are not manually adding UTMs in Google Ads because we have the auto-tagging option enabled in HubSpot. When we enable specific campaigns, we start receiving form submissions, but HubSpot does not attribute them to Google Ads.

I would appreciate any suggestions or insights on how we can resolve this issue. Thanks
